TextLibrary.Text: Drong
Drong wants some more rock.
Drong wants some more rock.
Drong wants some more rock.
Drong wants some more rock.
More rock? Not back to the Valley of the Kings again...
More rock? Not back to the Valley of the Kings again...
More rock? Not back to the Valley of the Kings again...
More rock? Not back to the Valley of the Kings again...
No. Drong saw some nice hot rocks up on that Volcano.
No. Drong saw some nice hot rocks up on that Volcano.
No. Drong saw some nice hot rocks up on that Volcano.
No. Drong saw some nice hot rocks up on that Volcano.
On the Volcano? Why didn't you get them while we were up there?
On the Volcano? Why didn't you get them while we were up there?
On the Volcano? Why didn't you get them while we were up there?
On the Volcano? Why didn't you get them while we were up there?
Drong was not hungry. Drong burnt his mouth trying to nibble on a Fire Elemental.
Drong was not hungry. Drong burnt his mouth trying to nibble on a Fire Elemental.
Drong was not hungry. Drong burnt his mouth trying to nibble on a Fire Elemental.
Drong was not hungry. Drong burnt his mouth trying to nibble on a Fire Elemental.
Oh, all right. Come on...
